outputs.output_descr: The project aims to develop a model for making food available and accessible in a sustainable manner in poor households at the community level. By promoting the planting of carbohydrate-rich root and tuber crops, vitamin- and mineral- rich native vegetables and growing protein-rich native chicken in home gardens, the project will link production in home gardens to consumption at the household kitchen. It will also link production in school gardens to consumption in feeding programs of schools and day care centers.

project_descr: SAPAT: Sapat at Masustansyang Pagkain sa Bawat Tahanan (Sufficient Nutritious Food in Every Household) -- Developing a Model to Enhance Food Security and Nutrition in the Philippines
project_title: SAPAT:  Developing Model to Expand National Food Base
